title: Volvo Car India hikes ​internal combustion engine vehicle prices by 2%
description: ​​ Following the price hike of internal combustion engine (ICE) vehicles, the XC60 is now priced at Rs 68.9 lakh, the S90 at Rs 68.25 lakh and the XC90 at Rs 1,00,89,000, Volvo Car India said in a statement.
